title: Why would u buff jax ?
body:
so a base bonus 50 armor and 50 magic resistance isn't enough? He already outduels everything with just merely a tri force. the guy gets like 200 armor and magic resist in his normal build anyway, his E has plenty of use. Now he'll be having 70 base magic resistance and armor? because we need a jax with 300 armor and 300 magic resistance shitting on everything. Like what were you thinking.

goodbye trynd {{champion:23}}

replies.body: read the patch notes for the upcoming patch..
Yeah... I don't quite agree with these buffs. Jax is gonna be a REALLY strong pick in this patch. Just Leap+W+Sheen Proc does 40% of a carry's health already lol.
it's for like 7 seconds, and really jax has recieved nothing but nerfs lately
7 seconds in a team fight is a long time :/
all you need is one slow and jax cannot stick to you whatsoever, and he won't be able to gap close for about 5 seconds
you realise he vcan 5 man stun burst damage and jump if you escape.. he is a god champion
Yeah, I always thought jax was strong the way he was

Yes, it buffed the base, but if you have played jax lately you would realize, his r armor/mr gets auto canceled after taking damage from a spell. It really doesn't do anything to anything other than an aa.

No it doesn't lol.

He presses R and he gets bonus MR and Armor for 8 seconds. Nothing cancels it.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Jax
try playing him, his r is buggy since path 5.8 and cancels on spell damage
who wants a piece of the champ?
maybe tyndamere is actually a figure of our imaginations o.0
if you play tryndermere you lose the rights to have feelings
